name: Discipline: Teikoku no Tanjyou
overview: (Google Translated from the official Japanese WiiWare listing) The first label of "Haikage Bunko" labeled by Kazutoshi Iida, a creator known for high artistic games. Adventure game works that become a subject of simulated experiment performed in the mysterious accommodation facility "Discipline" in the near future, and live together with strange inmates. The main character you should do is to use "you con" strange equipment that speaks words to satisfy the desires of the inmates and to "break the wall of the mind". However, if you are watching over what you are using, or if the inmate can not stop wanting it abnormally, it will be subject to severe penalties called "one person". The inmates who "collapsed" heart gradually open hearts to you, begin to talk about their thoughts and memories. While reading about the unique and anomalous words, the true purpose hidden in "discipline", and the lost past you will be revealed.
